post.body: @thisisconlan oh MAN, he had me at 'But Butte', thanks for that! not getting as much work done as i should on this fryday.
Mine is a mini cone-shaped rosemary bush from hardware store but it's looking like Charlie Brown's...seasoned cashews rule!
your icon-thingy looks like my pez dispenser!
thanks! we both work here but not often 'together', sadly. i run across his path at committee mtgs and when i'm just lucky.
CONGRATS! hey, when was the 1st?
OHHH, yes, I've seen them... 'supposedly' 'retro' in appearance, taking after the Prima. hey, any vespa is a good vespa!
VERY cool! what year? i have a '78 Primavera and a 2001 ET4. 1964 GL is pieces project on 'hold'.
MAN, i don't know why i never saw this...OR your other @s.... Lasik went well, took in fire evacuees (incl 3 spec.needs kitties)
I found Elvis' Christmas tunes dvd at the Goodwill yesterday, $2.49! Chair I was after is gone tho.
@Skies (whoever you are!)--can you please wait one more day or at least until my friends leave tonight? plus am on errands on scoot
dream that you, KOBWebb and I were at FR...I was soooo bummed when I woke up!
cool, thanks---i'll pass that news on the the person who loaned it to me!
um, i have a library book due 12/21. La biblioteque est encore ouverte?
i got the pumpkin cookies (a freakin' gazillion), gingerbread, the most adorable mini carrot cupcakes imaginable. and decorated
when i lived in europe, sweetened condensed milk came in tubes and you squeezed it on a spoon...came in colors too! YUM.
lunchtime errand running--awesome! post office was empty and i met the Postmaster General! told him about the mean man at San Roque
hope you're at home, nobody here wants to be sick for christmas either! lots of fluids and rest.
scored a personal best! SIX bags of groceries on scoot!! INCL: several bottles of champagne and eggs! PLUS four flutes from the Goodwill!
on with the big girl panties and let the 'Skirts' win...wait, i wore a skirt 2day....um, but i rode a scooter to work, they had the heat on.
wondering if pizza is in my future. TWICE, large pizzas passed under my nose--when starved! pizza/gift wrapping party 2nite, my place!
garage door guy supposed to call any minute...automatic door opener isn't so automatic. just in time for the five days of rain! so says web
heading out to locksmith---excited and nervous at the same time. WHAT has been locked in that box?
locksmith called--got the box open! surfaced during the move--locked for 25 yrs, no joke. he promised he wouldn't look...or turn me in.
forgot to mention--The Reader--a MUST SEE movie--got a sneak preview invite (thanks!!). disclaimer--nudity..both actors, both sides.
almost got nailed going home in the dark after work last night----headlamp only works on 'high beam', it seems. damn.
just discovered new season of Flight of the Conchords starts Jan 18th, 2009......i am sososoSO happy now.
skipping cupcakes and book reading with the girls---haaachooo! but luckily i have a cupcake here so i'm with you in spirit!
must keep hands OFF website until AFTER presentation lest I 'eff' it up (again) and have to redo. leave 'other stuff' for after class ends.
I am one lucky lady....such fantastic people in my life. THANK YOU! yes, even YOU! : )
just added snowflake cookies to my breakfast of champions--MAN, they're tasty!
why did i think an espresso after 2 g&t & limoncello would make a diff? b'fast is a diet coke. ew. some friendly faces @ the Trat tho!
man, if i have to moonlight i have found the right group! super fun small event last night, LUVLUVLUV the folks i work with. and YUMMY too!
zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzgetupandgettowork,cateringevent@4zzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
Does anybody know anything about tankless water heaters? i have hot water upstairs with good pressure but downstairs, zilch y zilch.
a baking FIEND! gingerbread, carrot cupcakes, more nuts, pumpkin cookies, rockin' to Elvis' xmas tunes.....my oven works & Lulu is funny.
saw lots of elderly ladies on the streets of SB behind the wheel of vintage VW Bugs---slow and erratic---truly inspiring. i want my '67 back
so pissed at continued gov't bailout. seeing red today. better go get a homemade cookie at the helpdesk...and a coffee.
just ate a LOAD of nuts/m&m mix, thanks a lot, co-worker, no i MEAN it! 'lite' chicken noodle soup for dinner. nah.
whew, got the last spot in the only class i can squeeze in next semester...online. will take one 'face to face' in audit mode, aahhh
checking weather---hmm, think i'll drive to work today---first time in a looong time---like almost a year! school's out, spaces available.
today was a whole lotta bad communication. it's (almost) funny...'who's on first', THAT kind of bad communication. the crazy making kind.
wondering when is it time to buy a new digital camera---when the batteries add up to replacement cost? an upgrade? or one from circuit city?
need to train Lulu to clean up the house....phone call re: visit TONIGHT! She should be able to swat dustbunnies under the rug, right?
half done with the meal, not the day!
thinking i just ate my allotted calories for the day---and i'm only half done.
finally thawed from scoot ride in--FYI Ladies, shorter skirts work better on scoots, long skirt doesn't cut it---turns into sail.
MAN, I'm hungry today! Guess I didn't eat enough of those cannoli nor eggnog RUM cake last night.....
wooohooo, went to the gym at lunchtime!!! but only for a minute---they have free coffee and all campus facilities are c l o s e d.
thawing from scoot night ride and morning ride to work by listening to vespa xmas party cd and smiling. i scored in gift xchnge, THANX ALL!
